channel.title: [317] Turning Character (Making it look at something)
channel.description:
How can I make the character face an object. What I want to do is have the character face a tree when they click it.
Is there a packet that turns the character? Where can I find packet documentation for Server -> Client?

item.title: [317] Turning Character (Making it look at something)
item.dc:creator: @jSherz jSherz
item.description:
@jSherz wrote:

I’m using TestScape and don’t have a FacePlayer method and also am stuck with the process method until I am good enough at Java / RSPS programming to convert to being event driven. Also, how would I go about adding the check to a packet?

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Turning Character (Making it look at something)

item.title: [317] Turning Character (Making it look at something)
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

  1. Use the FacePlayer method.

  2. Also, don’t use the process method, be event driven or put the check in a packet or something.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Turning Character (Making it look at something)
